name: Testo Widget V1
description: Minimalist Notion Template for Testo.Works with Android/iOS Notion widgets. Looks great on desktop too!Comes with 5 standard Testos. Change, remove, or add Testo as you need.Entries are auto-generated at the start (00:01) of Mondays and Thursdays.Can be customized for different Testo different days. Duplicate @Today, and modify repeat interval.Look for the "Get Template Now" button on the confirmation page.Duplicate Testo Widget to your Notion. Add a Notion widget (Page) on your phone. Select .T
features: Duplicate Testo Widget to your Notion.; Add a Notion widget (Page) on your phone.; Select .Testo as the widget database.
